name: iso_engine
description: Isomorphic Javascript engine written in Coffeescript. Just for fun.
author: Tim Meeuwissen

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min && npm run build:stats
scripts.build:stats: (echo '\033[35;3m' ; cd dist/build && ls -lh index*js index*gz | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $5,$9}')
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/build/index.min.mjs -- dist/build/index.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/build/index.min.mjs > dist/build/index.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd: rollup dist/src/index.js --file dist/build/index.umd.js -p json --format umd --name sayHello
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/build/index.umd.min.js -- dist/build/index.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/build/index.umd.min.js > dist/build/index.umd.min.js.gz
